It’s great to have Matt on your side when negotiating to purchase a property. I highly recommend his services.” Mr. and Mrs. Salmon Home sold in The Vineyards Not enough accolades to describe our experience. From finding our dream home, to selling our previous home. and everything in between. Their knowledge of SWFL in addition to their website and technology are top notch! Also provided other resources to make our transition smooth. Thank you team Klinowski Peggy David Home sold in Colonial Country Club Colonial CC We interviewed several top realtors in Naples before choosing our listing agent. Some agents were overly aggressive while others pointed out negative features to lower our list price for a quick sale. Matt Klinowski, the Naples Golf Guy, was the perfect fit for us. He presented himself professionally, was articulate, agreeable and well prepared to discuss our listing terms. Matt was always quick to respond to questions or ideas we had. Best of all, our home sold in just 2… J. Greaves Home sold in The Vineyards I highly recommend Matt Klinowski to anyone who is looking to buy property in Naples. He exhibits professionalism, knowledge of the golf community market, and has a low-pressure business approach. Matt did an awesome job from start to finish getting us into the property that we wanted at a price that we were comfortable paying. Anne Billak Home sold in  
                        Esplande Country Club Matt has superior knowledge of the Naples golf communities. His in-depth analysis of home values, lot values, supporting infrastructures (clubhouse, fitness centers, courts, pools, workout facilities), and home price per sq. foot all make for an educated buying experience. Multiple factors in a Naples golf home purchase are complex. Bundled or Equity, Initiation, Dues, HOA fees, and Taxes all need to be vetted. The quality of the homes and the golf course are of obvious concern as is resale. His… Home sold in 
                        Twineagle Matt is outstanding! The best realtor we’ve ever worked with!! Our process started with a set of objectives for our future home and golf community. Matt was quickly able to prepare a shortlist of communities that could fit the bill. My husband and I are 3,000 miles away…that was no problem at all. We iterated with Matt via phone and email to narrow potential communities some more. When we finally visited Naples, we looked in three communities where Matt had… Cindy Yoder-Brown Home sold in Grey Oaks We decided to buy a second home in Naples while staying there for the winter of 2018. We knew that we wanted to move into a golf course community, but the number of choices in the area were overwhelming. We started talking to and emailing with Matt Klinowski in May of 2018, knowing that we would not be back in Naples until January of 2019. During that eight-month period, Matt helped us prioritize our requirements for the new home, and… Coach Home sold in Talis Park In our search to understand the different Naples golf communities, Matt was the most unbelievable resource we could have asked for. He understands all of the unique attributes of each club community and truly helped us understand all of the nuances of each. His research and investment in understanding the market is unparalleled and I would highly recommend Matt to anyone looking to purchase in Naples who needs help in navigating all of the complexities. Stuart Mooney Search Naples Golf Communities Beyond Our ExpectationsTrying to purchase real estate in Florida from out of town is a very overwhelming process. However, once my wife and I started working with Matt, the process became simple. His knowledge of the area, business approach and professionalism coupled with his customer service were above and beyond our expectations. We highly recommend Matt. Jim Lather Attached Villa Sold in Lely Resort Matt was incredible in helping us find the perfect condo for us. He always had our best interest at heart and guided us through an extensive search. He went above and beyond any realtor I’ve worked with. With Matt you won’t get what you want to hear you just get an honest evaluation putting you first. I will use him again in the future. J. Chatham Condo sold in Lely Resort I am extremely happy with Matt and my new home purchase. He made sure he informed me of every detail in the purchasing process. He is an excellent negotiator and truly cares. He goes above and beyond most realtors.He made everything so convenient for me. I highly recommend Matt to anyone. E. He shared with us all the market research and, prior to its listing, made sure that we had all the necessary information for the potential buyers. His description of the property was very accurate and it facilitated the sale. (It was the third showing that generated an offer, and the buyers were looking for a house that was exactly what he had described)! Naples Heritage Golf and Country Club, Naples Florida, 26 Homes For Sale in Naples Heritage Golf — Janet Berry Luxury Home Team Buy Testimonials Team Contact Us Blog SEARCH NEW CONSTRUCTION HOMES HOMES JUST LISTED Home Buy Testimonials Team Contact Us Blog SEARCH NEW CONSTRUCTION HOMES HOMES JUST LISTED Home Naples Heritage Community in Naples Florida Naples Heritage is one of the Bundled Golf Communities in Naples where homeowners and condo owner's membership is included, or "bundled" in with the purchase price of a home. Naples Heritage is a casually elegant golf and country club community situated on 550 acres of land in Naples, Florida. With more than 350 acres of preserves, lakes and open space, Naples Heritage Golf and Country Club NHGCC has the lowest density of any community of its type in Naples.The Gordon Lewis design opened in 1997, and delivers championship caliber golf for players of every age and skill level. Featuring seven tee combinations for men, and three for women, the course stretches from 4,550 - 6,489 yards. Renovations in 2015 included new Celebration grass fairways and TifEagle bermudagrass greens. GPS in every golf cart, a Pro Shop with the latest gear, aqua driving range, and staff of PGA Professionals complete the NHGCC golf experience. The community is made up of 550 acres. of which 252 acres are Florida natural preserves.  Naples Heritage Golf and Country Club NHGCC has the lowest density of any community of its type in Naples There are 799 homes in Naples Heritage which consists of 101 single family homes, 140 villas, 299 verandas, and 270 terraces. The Naples Heritage community is built around an 18 hole golf course which was designed by Gordon Lewis and renovated in 2015 with new Tiff-Eagle Greens.  New putting green constructed in 2020.  Heritage Greens is a par 72 course with 6,603 in total yardages with 10 different tees to accommodate all levels of golfers. Completely renovated clubhouse, expanded to 15,000 square feet, and beautifully refurbished in 2007. The interior of the Naples Heritage Golf and Country Club Clubhouse Was Renovated in 2017, and the Pro Shop was newly renovated in 2015. The Heritage Room, a Dedicated Game and Meeting Room was Renovated in 2020. a New, State of The Art Fitness Facility Was Completed in 2020. New Resort-Style Pool and Spa and Three Satellite Community Pools. Six Contiguous Har-Tru Tennis Courts With a Tennis Pavilion Built in 2020 and One Hard Court. Two Bocce Courts. Clubhouse & Activities The award-winning culinary staff offers delicious casual, poolside and white-tablecloth dining options throughout the week. Special events are highlighted with live entertainment and extraordinary food choices. Book Club, Card, and Table game groups meet regularly. NHGCC members are active both inside and outside the NHGCC community. Club activities throughout the year include; Live Dinner Shows, Game Nights, Theme and Holiday Parties, Card and Table Games, Bocce, Book Discussion Groups, and Mah Jong. Meetings | Naples Heritage CDD Skip to Main Content Open main menu Search Site Home Links Events Documents Contacts Information Show sub menu for Information About the CDD Finances Meetings Questions Services Website Accessibility Home Meetings Board Meetings The Board of Supervisors of the Naples Heritage Community Development District will hold their meetings at the Naples Heritage Golf and Country Club Clubhouse, 8150 Heritage Club Way, Naples, Florida 34112. Meetings may be continued to a date and time certain, which will be announced at the meeting. There may be occasions when one or more Supervisors will participate by telephone. Any person requiring special accommodations at this meeting because of a disability or physical impairment should contact the District Office at (954) 603-0033 at least forty-eight (48) hours prior to the meeting. If you are hearing or speech impaired, please contact the Florida Relay Service by dialing 7-1-1, or 1-800-955-8771 (TTY) / 1-800-955-8770 (Voice), for aid in contacting the District Manager’s Office. Each person who decides to appeal any decision made by the Board with respect to any matter considered at the meeting is advised that person will need a record of the proceedings and that, accordingly, the person may need to ensure that a verbatim record of the proceedings is made, including the testimony and evidence upon which such appeal is to be based.
